attributes.additional_details:
So bad the Government cannot deal with this issue so that UK Citizens cannot get one of the major proofs of identity which is required in this country
So many people are unable to get a job because the the government are taking at least 10 weeks to process the main identity this country recognises for people to gain employment, applying for mortgages ,bank accounts,education,every day life to prove we exist.
The government need to employ more staff today.Not in a few weeks and be aware this situation that can
occur at anytime and procedures need to be in place immediately if this occurs not wait until it does.
We are meant to be a "Free Country" but when it's own identity needed to prove this we are let down by our government .
